Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ActSpecObsCode

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActSpecObsCode

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ActSpecObsCodeActSpecObsCodeIdentifies the type of observation that is made about a specimen that may affect its processing, analysis or further result interpretation

name: ActSpecObsCode
title: ActSpecObsCode
description: Identifies the type of observation that is made about a specimen that may affect its processing, analysis or further result interpretation
